message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $200. I believe it holds significant value, even beyond its price.
I'm really interested in the product, but $200 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $120?
Bob, thanks for your interest.  I understand your budget concerns, but $120 is too low for me.  Would you consider $170?
I'm still interested in the product, but I really can't go above $150. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $160?
